headline: Utility Stocks Ameren, CenterPoint Power Up In Buy Zones Amid Volatile Stock Market
summary: Utility stocks Ameren and CenterPoint Energy reached new highs this past week, as the stock market endured another round of volatility stemming from fears about artificial-intelligence disruption. Both stocks to watch are featured on Investor's Business Daily's New Highs list.

headline: Wells Fargo Maintains Overweight on Ameren, Raises Price Target to $113
summary: Wells Fargo  analyst Shahriar Pourreza   maintains Ameren (NYSE:AEE) with a Overweight and raises the price target from $111 to $113.

headline: Utilities Soar On Surging Power Demand From Data Centers
summary: The good times may not last as the dynamic between AI firms and utility companies draws bipartisan scrutiny.
